title: Frozen Chapel of the Shadow Crown
story: The chapel is situated deep in the high mountains, far from civilization. Lately an undead manticore has made its home here. The chapel is a place of growth of a highly valued specie of blooms.

notes.text: A broken box with a key in it.
A notable double door with a keyhole to the west.
An eye preserved in a jar, turns into ashes when shaken.
A basket containing a scale mail and some gold.
